titleStmt.title: A letter to the right honourable, and right reverend the general assembly of the church of Scotland, or their commissioners.

notesStmt.note: Dated: Westminster June 7. 1648; signed: Charles Herle, Prolocutor; W. Gouge Assessor; Henry Robrough Scriba.; Adoniram Byfield Scriba.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
